name: Jasmine Dixon
description: An cop whose integrity was her undoing, Jasmine Dixon started patrolling the streets ofNight Cityin2061and worked her way up to the ranks to sergeant. One day at the precinct, she overhead something she shouldn't have. Instead of ignoring it, she reported it to her supervisor who had her involuntarily committed to aNight City Center for Psychiatric Healthfacility inRancho Coronadofor her troubles. Vis later hired byMuamar Reyesto break her out of the facility and even though Jasmine has no money she could pay him back with a favor.
